option.name: input
option.description: Input file or directory (a directory is required for source mode). Multiple paths can be specified separated by a space (for example, --input PATH_1 PATH_2).

option.name: target
option.description: The target server/technology/framework to migrate to. This could include multiple items (eg, "eap7" and "cloud-readiness") separated by a space. Use --listTargetTechnologies to get known targets.

option.name: output
option.description: Output Directory (WARNING: any existing files will be removed).

option.name: overwrite
option.description: Force overwrite of the output directory, without prompting.

option.name: userRulesDirectory
option.description: User Rules Directory (Search pattern: *.windup.groovy, *.windup.xml, *.rhamt.groovy, *.rhamt.xml, *.mta.groovy and *.mta.xml). Multiple paths can be specified separated by a space (for example, --userRulesDirectory PATH_1 PATH_2).

option.name: userLabelsDirectory
option.description: User Labels Directory (Search pattern: *.windup.label.xml, *.rhamt.label.xml, and *.mta.label.xml). Multiple paths can be specified separated by a space (for example, --userLabelsDirectory PATH_1 PATH_2).

option.name: userIgnorePath
option.description: A path to the list of path patterns to skip during execution. If it points to a directory, all contained files named '*rhamt-ignore.txt', '*windup-ignore.txt' or '*mta-ignore.txt' will be considered as such list.

option.name: skipReports
option.description: If set, MTA will not generate reports.

option.name: sourceMode
option.description: Indicates whether the input file or directory is a source code or compiled binaries (Default: Compiled).

option.name: excludePackages
option.description: A list of java package name prefixes to exclude (eg, com.myapp.subpackage). Multiple options may be specified, separated by a space.

option.name: mavenizeGroupId
option.description: All pom.xml files will use this value as their <groupId>. If the parameter is omitted, MTA tries to guess some value based on the application, but this guess may be wrong. Last resort default value is 'com.mycompany.mavenized'.

option.name: exportCSV
option.description: Indicates whether to export CSV file containing the migration information.

option.name: excludeTags
option.description: Indicates the tags to exclude from processing. If this is unset, then all tags will be processed. If this is set, then Rules with the specified tags will be skipped.

option.name: packages
option.description: A list of java package name prefixes to scan (eg, com.myapp). Multiple items can be separated by a space (eg, --packages PACKAGE_1 PACKAGE_2).

option.name: source
option.description: The source server/technology/framework to migrate from. This could include multiple items (eg, "eap" and "spring") separated by a space. Use --listSourceTechnologies to get known sources.

option.name: additionalClasspath
option.description: Adds additional files or directories to the classpath

option.name: disableTattletale
option.description: If set, a Tattletale report won't be generated.

option.name: enableCompatibleFilesReport
option.description: If set, MTA will generate a report of 'Compatible Files'. Keep in mind that generating this report may take a long time for large applications.

option.name: includeTags
option.description: Indicates the tags to process. If this is unset, then all tags will be processed. If this is set, then only Rules with the specified tags will be processed.

option.name: online
option.description: Indicates that network access is allowed. By turning it on, XML schemas can be validated against external resources, however, this comes with a performance penalty.

option.name: enableClassNotFoundAnalysis
option.description: Enable analysis of Java files that are not available on the Classpath. This should be left off if some classes will be unavailable at analysis time.

option.name: enableTattletale
option.description: If set, a Tattletale report will be generated for each application.

option.name: explodedApp
option.description: If the input path points to a directory, it should be treated as an unzipped application, instead of a directory containing applications (default).

option.name: keepWorkDirs
option.description: If set, MTA will not delete the temporary working files, like graph database and unzipped archives. Debugging purposes.

option.name: mavenize
option.description: Create a Maven project stub (a directory structure with pom.xml files) based on the structure and content of the application. This helps with locating the libraries and their versions, as well as adding the right Java EE API and creating the correct dependencies between the project modules.

option.name: inputApplicationName
option.description: This represents the full name of a given application.
